programme.title: A brand new decade - 1990
programme.short_synopsis: What effect did the presidency of Ronald Reagan have on the American welfare system?
programme.medium_synopsis: The administration of Ronald Reagan and the upheaval of the American tax and welfare systems during the 1980s, as discussed by Alistair Cooke.
